ing: 20 pieces fruit-flavored hard candy (such as Jolly RancherÂ®)
des: "These colorful vodkas are a fun addition to any bar and are an approachable alcoholic drink for anyone of age. Cherry, sour apple, and watermelon are divine. Serve chilled."
ins:
Place candies in a container with a lid and add vodka. Seal container and place in a cool, dark place, shaking vigorously 1 to 2 times per hour, until candy has dissolved, 3 to 4 hours.
Stir sugar into vodka mixture until dissolved.
